attributes.action: Nominate Oxford University /Astra Zeneca for a Nobel Prize for COVID 19 work
attributes.additional_details:
The Covid 19 pandemic has killed & hundreds of thousands across the globe & infected many more. Its full economic, social & political impact remains unknown but is likely to be dramatic & long lasting.
The Oxford/Astra Zeneca team developed a safe & effective vaccine currently saving life & reducing spread.
Making the vaccine available at cost price for the duration of the pandemic is stunningly selfless humanitarian gesture which will impact the ability to reduce the global impact of the virus
attributes.background:
HM Government to nominate Oxford University /Astra Zeneca for a Nobel Prize recognising their outstanding contribution to combating COVID 19 globally
This contribution includes not just the development of the vaccine but the outstanding humanitarian gesture of making it available at cost price.

rejection.details:
In any case, we can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  You can see who can nominate for the  Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine here: 

https://www.nobelprize.org/nomination/medicine/
